generic_name: ASCLEPIAS VINCETOXICUM, ECHINACEA (ANGUSTIFOLIA), HYPOTHALAMUS SUIS, CEREBRUM SUIS, HEPAR SUIS, KIDNEY (SUIS), METHYLCOBALAMIN, PANCREAS SUIS, STOMACH (SUIS), AACG-A, AACG-B, CALCAREA CARBONICA, GAMBOGIA, GELSEMIUM SEMPERVIRENS, GRAPHITES, NUX VOMICA, PHYTOLACCA DECANDRA, 7-OXO-DEHYDROEPIANDROSTERONE-3BETA-ACETATE (7-KETO), ADENOSINUM TRIPHOSPHORICUM DINATRUM, GLUCAGON, INSULINUM (SUIS), SARCOLACTICUM ACIDUM, PROTEUS (VULGARIS)
warnings: WARNINGS: Keep out of reach of children. In case of overdose, contact physician or a Poison Control Center right away. If pregnant or breast-feeding, ask a health professional before use. Tamper seal: "Sealed for Your Protection." Do not use if seal is broken or missing.
dosage_administration: DIRECTIONS: 1-10 drops under the tongue, 3-6 times a day or as directed by a health professional. Consult a physician for use in children under 12 years of age.
indications: HOMEOPATHIC INDICATIONS: For temporary relief of symptoms related to increased appetite, regulation of fat metabolism, headache and fatigue.** **These statements are based upon traditional homeopathic principles. They have not been reviewed by the Food and Drug Administration.
